text: 6.26 Jop 38.41, Sng 147.9, Mat 10.29-31, Luk 12.6-7, 12.24 Nɨb nepɨm, yawl okok tap yɨŋ ma yɨbal, tap ñɨŋeb okok ma tɨk dap nan gɨpal agak. Bapi nɨbi man ne alaŋ ak pen kɨlop tap ñɨl kod mɨdeb tap ñɨbal agak. Ne yawl tap yokɨp ak anɨgɨl gup, nɨbi pen binɨb yɨbɨl ak, taynen chɨnop ma kod yenɨgab agɨl gos kuŋay nepɨm agak?
